org.richfaces.context

Class FullVisitContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.component.visit.VisitContext
      • org.richfaces.context.FullVisitContext

  • public class FullVisitContext
extends javax.faces.component.visit.VisitContext
    A VisitContext used to visit all children and trees. Use visitHints to filter tune which components are visited.
    Author:
    Brian Leathem
